dependencies.description:
Faster zlib and gzip compatible compression and decompression by
providing Python bindings for the ISA-L library.
dependencies.name: py-isal

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Bakta: rapid & standardized annotation of bacterial genomes, MAGs &
plasmids
dependent_to.name: py-bakta

dependent_to.description:
Cutadapt finds and removes adapter sequences, primers, poly-A tails and
other types of unwanted sequence from your high-throughput sequencing
reads.
dependent_to.name: py-cutadapt

dependent_to.description: Read and write FASTQ and FASTA
dependent_to.name: py-dnaio

dependent_to.description:
TEsorter is coded for LTR_retriever to classify long terminal repeat
retrotransposons (LTR-RTs) at first. It can also be used to classify any
other transposable elements (TEs), including Class I and Class II
elements which are covered by the REXdb database.
dependent_to.name: py-tesorter

dependent_to.description:
WhatsHap is a software for phasing genomic variants using DNA sequencing
reads, also called read-based phasing or haplotype assembly.
dependent_to.name: py-whatshap

description:
This small Python module provides a xopen function that works like the
built-in open function, but can also deal with compressed files.
Supported compression formats are gzip, bzip2 and xz. They are
automatically recognized by their file extensions .gz, .bz2 or .xz.
name: py-xopen

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
